alert.note: Alert for Parker Valley (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 15 at 12:24PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern La Paz, northern Imperial and Riverside Counties through 115 PM MST/115 PM PDT/... At 1223 PM MST/1223 PM PDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Palo Verde, or 33 miles northwest of Martinez Lake, moving northwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Blythe, Palo Verde and Cibola. This includes the following highways... CA Interstate 10 between mile markers 130 and 140. CA Route 78 between mile markers 75 and 80. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
